summary: This is a forwarded email regarding scheduling a rack installation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, sent on August 11, 2019. The email appears to be related to a camera project at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

persons.name: Jeff Cranor
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of the original email regarding the MCC New York rack installation.

events.title: Email about MCC rack installation
events.description: An email is forwarded regarding scheduling a rack installation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, to be added to a camera project.

keyFacts: An email dated August 11, 2019 discusses a rack installation at MCC New York.
The email is related to a camera project at the correctional facility.
Jeffrey Epstein was held at MCC New York at the time of his death in August 2019.
